name: postmark
description: Ridiculously Simple Email Sending From Node.js For http://www.postmarkapp.com
author: Andrew Theken <andrew+postmark.js@wildbit.com>

scripts.compile-docs: echo 'Generating docs...' && mkdir -p ./docs && rm -r ./docs && node_modules/.bin/typedoc --module postmark --name Postmark.js --out ./docs --excludeProtected --excludePrivate --excludeNotExported --hideGenerator --theme minimal --mode file && git add -A ./docs && echo 'Generated docs!'
scripts.pull-docs: git subtree pull --prefix docs origin gh-pages
scripts.push-docs: git subtree push --prefix docs origin gh-pages
